head.title: Generate QR code for {{FileFormatUp}} files using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Harness the {{ProdShortName}} API to generate QR code for {{FileFormatUp}} files. Seamlessly embed QR codes on any page for enhanced functionality.

header.title: Generate QR codes for {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: Effortlessly generate 2D barcodes using text or numeric data and apply them across multiple pages and formats, including PDFs, Word, Excel, and more, via {{ProdFullName}}.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Discover the capabilities of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers an expansive range of features, empowering users to generate and embed various signature types across leading document formats. Whether itâ€™s PDFs, Word documents, Excel sheets, PowerPoint presentations, or image files, you can elevate your documents with Text, Image, Barcode, QR Code, Metadata, Digital, and Stamp signatures.

more_features.title: Comprehensive signature integration for documents
more_features.description: With {{ProdFullName}} API, users can effortlessly generate, modify, search, validate, and remove an array of signature types, streamlining document workflows with unparalleled precision.

feature_1.title: Document signing with multiple signature types
feature_1.content: {{ProdShortName}} enables the application of Text, Image, Barcode, QR Code, and Stamp signatures to any document format. Signatures can be precisely placed on any page, and metadata can be seamlessly managed through metadata signatures. Protect the integrity of your documents by incorporating digital certificates that prevent unauthorized alterations.

feature_2.title: Signature search and validation
feature_2.content: Verify the authenticity and accuracy of document signatures through an advanced validation process. Easily retrieve a detailed list of all signatures embedded in a document for comprehensive oversight.

feature_3.title: Customizable signature modification
feature_3.content: Update and refine previously applied signatures by adjusting content, placement, color, size, and other attributes to meet your specific needs.

feature_4.title: Efficient signature removal
feature_4.content: Streamline your document management by programmatically removing unwanted signatures. Whether dealing with digital certificates or other signature types, removal can be done swiftly and effectively.

formats.title: Generate QR codes for other document formats
formats.description: Enhance all industry-standard file formats with the ability to embed QR codes through the {{EnvName}} API. Store and encode critical information into 2D barcodes for seamless scanning and data retrieval.

operations.title: Learn about our signature solutions
operations.description: We proudly present a wide range of signature types and operational features

steps.title: How to generate and insert a QR code in any place within a {{FileFormatUp}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) facilitates the generation of QR codes in various popular formats and their placement on {{FileFormatUp}} pages. Supporting over 10 types of QR codes, our library can be seamlessly integrated into {{EnvName}} applications. Enhance your documents with QR code signatures using our product.

content.step_3: Customize visual parameters such as color, position, size, etc.
